# The `InstrAndOperands` Struct Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

Contains all the data we need to restore an &quot;erased&quot; (i.e., detached) instruction: the instruction itself and its operands in order. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

Contains all the data we need to restore an &quot;erased&quot; (i.e., detached) instruction: the instruction itself and its operands in order.
